tool_description: Performs comprehensive RF link budget analysis including gains, losses, margins, and system performance metrics for point-to-point or point-to-multipoint links.

tx_cable_loss_db.description: Transmitter cable/connector losses in dB (0 to 20)

rx_cable_loss_db.description: Receiver cable/connector losses in dB (0 to 20)

miscellaneous_loss_db.description: Additional system losses in dB (0 to 10)

noise_figure_db.description: Receiver noise figure in dB (0 to 20)

error_messages: Invalid power levels: Transmitter power out of reasonable range (-50 to 100 dBm).
Invalid antenna gains: Gain values must be within realistic bounds (-10 to 50 dBi).
Invalid path loss: Path loss must be positive value.
Invalid cable losses: Cable losses must be between 0 and 20 dB.
Invalid system losses: Miscellaneous losses must be between 0 and 10 dB.
Invalid SNR requirement: Required SNR must be positive value (0 to 50 dB).
Invalid noise figure: Noise figure must be between 0 and 20 dB.
Invalid bandwidth: Bandwidth must be positive value.
usage: Provide transmitter power, antenna gains, and path loss. Optionally specify cable losses, system losses, SNR requirements, noise figure, and bandwidth for detailed analysis.

received_power_dbm.description: Calculated received signal power in dBm

link_margin_db.description: Available link margin above required SNR in dB

link_quality.description: Overall link quality assessment: excellent, good, marginal, poor
